name: Stability
description: Stability exercises to improve balance and core strength.

workout_groups.name: Core Stability Drills
workout_groups.description: Exercises to strengthen the core and improve stability.

workouts.name: Plank
workouts.description: Hold a plank position for 1 minute.

workouts.name: Side Plank
workouts.description: Hold a side plank position for 1 minute on each side.

workouts.name: Bird Dog
workouts.description: Perform bird dog exercise for 2 minutes.

workouts.name: Dead Bug
workouts.description: Perform dead bug exercise for 2 minutes.

workout_groups.name: Balance Board Training
workout_groups.description: Exercises using a balance board to improve stability.

workouts.name: Balance Board Stand
workouts.description: Stand on a balance board for 1 minute.

workouts.name: Balance Board Squat
workouts.description: Perform squats on a balance board for 1 minute.

workouts.name: Balance Board Push-Up
workouts.description: Perform push-ups on a balance board for 2 minutes.

workouts.name: Balance Board Plank
workouts.description: Hold a plank position on a balance board for 2 minutes.

workouts.name: Single-Leg Balance with Arm Reach
workouts.description: Stand on one leg and reach forward with the opposite arm for 2 minutes.

workouts.name: Single-Leg Deadlift
workouts.description: Perform single-leg deadlifts for 2 minutes.

workouts.name: Single-Leg Squat
workouts.description: Perform single-leg squats for 2 minutes.

workouts.name: Dynamic Skater Jumps
workouts.description: Perform dynamic skater jumps for 2 minutes.

workout_groups.name: Elite Tactical Stability
workout_groups.description: High-intensity stability exercises for elite tactical athletes.

workouts.name: Weighted Plank
workouts.description: Hold a plank position with added weight for 2 minutes.

workouts.name: Single-Leg Squat with Weighted Vest
workouts.description: Perform single-leg squats with a weighted vest for 2 minutes.

workouts.name: Balance Board Push-Up with Clap
workouts.description: Perform push-ups on a balance board with a clap for 1 minute.

workouts.name: Dynamic Skater Jumps with Resistance Bands
workouts.description: Perform skater jumps with resistance bands for 2 minutes.

workout_groups.name: Extreme Endurance Balance
workout_groups.description: Extreme balance exercises for high endurance athletes.

workouts.name: Single-Leg Stand with Eyes Closed and Weighted Vest
workouts.description: Stand on one leg with eyes closed and a weighted vest for 3 minutes.

workouts.name: Single-Leg Deadlift with Twist and Resistance Bands
workouts.description: Perform single-leg deadlifts with a twist and resistance bands for 2 minutes.

workouts.name: Balance Board Squat with Medicine Ball Toss
workouts.description: Perform squats on a balance board while tossing a medicine ball for 2 minutes.

workouts.name: Dynamic Lateral Hops with Weighted Vest
workouts.description: Perform lateral hops with a weighted vest for 2 minutes.
